description: This file defines API-related functions, including a health check for the backend server and a WebSocket URL getter, utilizing external environment configurations and a logger.

methods.name: healthCheck()
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request to check backend health status. Handles various response scenarios, including network errors and non-200 responses, and logs warnings or errors accordingly.

methods.name: getWsUrl()
methods.description: Returns the WebSocket URL from environment configuration, defaulting to an empty string if undefined.
